sections.heading: Introduction
sections.content:
This is a sample document that demonstrates the conversion from JSON to PDF using Spring Batch and Apache PDFBox.

The document structure is defined in JSON format and then processed to generate a PDF document with proper formatting.

sections.heading: Features
sections.content:
This converter supports the following features:
- Document metadata (title, author, subject)
- Multiple sections with headings
- Text formatting
- Automatic page breaks

sections.heading: Implementation
sections.content:
The implementation uses Spring Batch for processing the JSON data and Apache PDFBox for generating the PDF documents.

Spring Batch provides a robust framework for batch processing, while PDFBox offers comprehensive PDF manipulation capabilities.
